short_summary: Lowest price to deliver flexible seating to the RCMP in Nova Scotia
description: The RCMP needs 1,000 to 10,000 office seating units, plus electrical controls for their install, depending on the type of chair. The government wants flexible seating for their facilities in New Minas, Kingston, and Wolfville, Nova Scotia.

<Title>Office Seating for RCMP Nova Scotia</Title>

<Tender Information>

* **Title/Designation**: Office Seating for RCMP Nova Scotia
* **Reference Number**: cb-551-97658128

* **Solicitation Number**: M4000-01384C

* **Amendment Date**: December 14, 2023
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: December 15, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2024

</Tender Information>

**Description**

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) in Nova Scotia requires the purchase and delivery of office seating to its locations in New Minas, Kingston, and Wolfville. This tender announcement supersedes previous solicitation number M4000-01384B, dated August 16, 2023, with a closing date of August 29, 2023.

**Product Categories**

The tender falls under the following product categories:

* Rotary chairs and Rotary stools
* Rotary Guest Chair and Side chairs

**Security Requirement**

This tender involves a security requirement. For additional information, please consult the bid solicitation document.

**Eligibility**

Only suppliers who are pre-qualified and have been issued a Supply Arrangement (SA) are eligible to bid. Non-Supply Arrangement (Non-SA) holders may submit a bid to the Identified User (IU) but must also submit an arrangement to the Supply Arrangement Authority (SAA) for evaluation. Canada is not required to delay the award of a resulting contract pending the evaluation of an arrangement and issuance of a SA by the PWGSC Supply Arrangement Authority.

**Contact Information**

For inquiries, please contact Rosalee Parsons at rosalee.parsons@rcmp-grc.gc.ca.

**Additional Information**

Suppliers who wish to become pre-qualified SA holders may contact TPSGC.PARCNAmeublement-APNCRFurniture.PWGSC@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.
